languages.text: Familiars seem to respond irratically to the sound of this whistle, but other than that it's just a trinket.

traits.locale_text: Familiars seem to respond irratically to the sound of this whistle, but other than that it's just a trinket.

languages.text: It's just a trinket, but whenever familiars hear the sound of this vox-whistle, they behave erratically. Still, it does not affect their combat capabilities.
languages.original_text: Когда фамильяры слышат звук, издаваемый этой безделушкой, они начинают вести себя непредсказуемо. Впрочем, это не влияет на их эффективность в бою.

languages.text: 这只是件小小的饰品，但只要使仆听到这个口哨的声音，就会变得行为古怪。不过，这并不会影响使仆的战斗能力。
languages.original_text: It's just a trinket, but whenever familiars hear the sound of this vox-whistle, they behave erratically. Still, it does not affect their combat capabilities.

traits.locale_text: 这只是件小小的饰品，但只要使仆听到这个口哨的声音，就会变得行为古怪。不过，这并不会影响使仆的战斗能力。
这只是件小小的饰品，但只要使仆听到这个口哨的声音，就会变得行为古怪。

languages.text: Ce n'est guère qu'un gadget, mais chaque fois que les familiers entendent ce sifflet-vox, ils adoptent un comportement imprévisible. Il n'a toutefois aucun effet sur leurs capacités de combat.
languages.original_text: It's just a trinket, but whenever familiars hear the sound of this vox-whistle, they behave erratically. Still, it does not affect their combat capabilities.

traits.locale_text: Ce n'est guère qu'un gadget, mais chaque fois que les familiers entendent ce sifflet-vox, ils adoptent un comportement imprévisible. Il n'a toutefois aucun effet sur leurs capacités de combat.

languages.text: No tiene propiedades especiales, pero, cuando los familiares oyen este voco silbato, se comportan de forma errática. Esto no afecta a sus capacidades de combate.
languages.original_text: It's just a trinket, but whenever familiars hear the sound of this vox-whistle, they behave erratically. Still, it does not affect their combat capabilities.

traits.locale_text: No tiene propiedades especiales, pero, cuando los familiares oyen este voco silbato, se comportan de forma errática. Esto no afecta a sus capacidades de combate.

languages.text: ただの小物だが、ファミリアーがこのヴォクス・ホイッスルの音を聞くと、不規則に行動する。ただしファミリアーの戦闘能力には影響しない。
languages.original_text: It's just a trinket, but whenever familiars hear the sound of this vox-whistle, they behave erratically. Still, it does not affect their combat capabilities.

traits.locale_text: ただの小物だが、ファミリアーがこのヴォクス・ホイッスルの音を聞くと、不規則に行動する。ただしファミリアーの戦闘能力には影響しない。
ただの小物だが、ファミリアーがこのヴォクス・ホイッスルの音を聞くと、不規則に行動する。

languages.text: Bu voks düdüğü, değersiz bir eşya gibi görünse de iyeler ne zaman sesini duysa bir garip davranmaya başlıyor. Yine de çatışma hünerlerinde bir etki yaratmıyor.
languages.original_text: It's just a trinket, but whenever familiars hear the sound of this vox-whistle, they behave erratically. Still, it does not affect their combat capabilities.

traits.locale_text: Bu voks düdüğü, değersiz bir eşya gibi görünse de iyeler ne zaman sesini duysa bir garip davranmaya başlıyor. Yine de çatışma hünerlerinde bir etki yaratmıyor.
Bu voks düdüğü, değersiz bir eşya gibi görünse de iyeler ne zaman sesini duysa bir garip davranmaya başlıyor.

languages.text: Sie ist nur ein Schmuckstück, aber wenn Vertraute den Klang dieser Vox-Pfeife hören, verhalten sie sich sonderbar. Allerdings hat sie keine Auswirkungen auf ihre Fähigkeiten im Kampf.
